definition: civil engineering/same as 土木工程[tu3 mu4 gong1 cheng2]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: He handed in a summary of the civil engineering project to the higher authorities.
sentences.chinese: 年底，他向上級交上了一份土建工程的總結。

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 雖浮想聯翩，亦不失爲楚鄉土建築實狀的反映。

sentences.english: E. Proceed construction procedures, install equipment for civil engineering construction.
sentences.chinese: 辦理施工手續，進行土建施工的設備安裝。

sentences.english: Neo-Vernacular is one of the architectural tendencies in the diversified world on contemporary.
sentences.chinese: 新鄉土建築是當代多元化世界的一種建築傾向。

sentences.english: The application of concrete in the field of civil engineering is extraordinary extensive.
sentences.chinese: 在土建工程中廣泛的應用混凝土。

sentences.english: The attitude of this project is consistent with green building and new vernacular architecture.
sentences.chinese: 這和綠色建築以及新鄉土建築的思路也是吻合的。

sentences.english: Check up with built-in pipe& hole& so on as per drawings during civil construction.
sentences.chinese: 依據圖紙設計檢查土建的予埋件預留空洞。

sentences.english: Participate in the hotel's pre-opening and decoration construction.
sentences.chinese: 參與了酒店前期的土建和裝修的施工。

sentences.english: There is a system of local energy-conservation techniques contained in the traditional vernacular buildings which fit to local climate.
sentences.chinese: 在傳統鄉土建築中蘊藏着一些適應當地氣候的技術。

sentences.english: The formal concept was developed complying with the historical concept of vernacular architecture.
sentences.chinese: 外形理念的開發遵守鄉土建築的歷史觀念。

sentences.english: Local building itself is the traditional architecture throughout.
sentences.chinese: 鄉土建築顧名思義就是各地的傳統建築。

definition: construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
road traffic safety (abbr. for 交通安全)
time allocated for a project/completion date
